title: Hoppy Holidays from St. Pete
post_excerpt: As November approaches, there is one thing that's clearâ€”everyone will begin to come home for the holidays!...
post_content:
As November approaches, there is one thing that's clear—everyone will begin to come home for the holidays! Although the weather in St. Pete remains beautiful all winter long, we still think that it calls for a little festive drinking. Thirsty Pelican Tours is a fun way to get the inside scoop of the brewing industry here in the Tampa Bay Area while still having a great time and drinking responsibly. 

This unique tour offers door-to-door service to the Postcard Inn and takes you to multiple different breweries. You can join a public tour or opt to do a private tour depending on your preferences. St. Pete has a plethora of delicious micro-breweries and this is one of the best ways to see them all. Load up the van with all your friends and family and let this be the way you ring in the holiday season together!
